CustomField.description: Defines the Invoice Entity that will be used on Invoices created using this Invoice Setting
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the Invoice Entity that will be used on Invoices created using this Invoice Setting
CustomField.label: Invoice Entity

lookupFilter.errorMessage: The Invoice Entity defined on the Invoice Setting does not have a Record Type of Invoice Entity. Please review.

CustomField.relationshipLabel: Invoice Settings with Account as Invoice Entity
